level.heading: License to confer degrees - Application; filing and recordation; use of public school personnel authorized.
Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 4004(b)(2) of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).
